alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Gulf, Liberty and northwestern Franklin Counties through 300 PM EDT/200 PM CDT/... At 214 PM EDT/114 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles east of Stonemill Creek to 10 miles northwest of Apalachicola. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. Heavy Rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange, Bristol, East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Vilas, Hosford, Jensen Place, Central City, Beverly, Red Hill, Clio, Kern, Willis Landing, Nixon Garden, Twin Pole, Hays Place, Fort Gadsden, Telogia, Buck Siding and Morgan Place. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
